title: Shining Friends
lyrics: Little faith, brightens are rainy day Life is difficult you can go away Don't hide yourselvies in a corner You have my place to stay Sorrow is gonna say goodbye Opens up you see the happy sunshine Keep going on with your dream Chasing tomorrow sunrise The spirit can never die Sun will shine my friend Won't let you cry my dear Seeing you, share the tear Make my woe disappear You never be alone in darkness See my smile my friend We are with you holding hands You have god to believe You are my destiny We meant to be your friends That's what a friendship be
